description: 自由市場轉蛋機，可獲得各種裝備道具

items.name: Scroll for Bottomwear for DEX 60%
items.description: Improves dexterity on the bottomwear.\nSuccess Rate 60%, DEX+2, speed+1. The success rate of this scroll can be enhanced by Vega's Spell.

items.name: Scroll for Bottomwear for HP 100%
items.description: Improves Max HP on bottomwear armors.

items.name: Scroll for Earring for DEF 10%
items.description: Improves DEF on earrings.\nSuccess Rate 10%, weapon defense+3, magic defense+3, Accuracy+1. The success rate of this scroll can be enhanced by Vega's Spell.

items.name: Scroll for Earring for DEF 100%
items.description: Improves DEF on earringsnSuccess Rate 100%, weapon defense+1

items.name: Scroll for Earring for DEF 60%
items.description: Improves DEF on earrings.\nSuccess Rate 60%, weapon defense+1, magic defense+1. The success rate of this scroll can be enhanced by Vega's Spell.

items.name: Scroll for Earring for INT 50%
items.description: Improves INT on ear accessory.\nSuccess rate:50%, magic attack +5, INT+3, magic def. +2

items.name: Scroll for Gloves for DEX 100%
items.description: Improves dexterity on gloves.\nSuccess rate: 100%, accuracy+2, DEX+2

items.name: Scroll for Gloves for Magic Attack 10%
items.description: Improves magic attack on the glove.\nSuccess Rate 10%, magic defense+1, magic attack+3, INT+3. The success rate of this scroll can be enhanced by Vega's Spell.

items.name: Scroll for Gloves for Magic Attack 100%
items.description: Improves magic attack on the glove.\nSuccess Rate 100%, magic attack+1

items.name: Scroll for Gloves for Magic Attack 60%
items.description: Improves magic attack on the glove.\nSuccess Rate 60%, magic attack+1, INT+1. The success rate of this scroll can be enhanced by Vega's Spell.

items.name: [6th Anniversary] Scroll for Gun for ATT 40%
items.description: Improves Attack on Maple Anniversary Guns.

items.name: Scroll for Helmet for Accuracy 10%
items.description: Improves the helmet's accuracy option.\nSuccess Rate 10%, Dex+2, Accuracy +4. The success rate of this scroll can be enhanced by Vega's Spell.

items.name: Scroll for Helmet for Accuracy 100%
items.description: Improves the helmet's accuracy option.\nSuccess Rate 100%, Accuracy +1

items.name: Scroll for Auf Haven Circlet for INT 60%
items.description: A scroll that can only be used on Auf Haven Circlet. INT+3. If failed, the item will be destroyed at a 50% rate.

items.name: Scroll for Helmet for Accuracy 60%
items.description: Improves the helmet's accuracy option.\nSuccess Rate 60%, Dex+1, Accuracy +2. The success rate of this scroll can be enhanced by Vega's Spell.

items.name: Scroll for Auf Haven Circlet for LUK 60%
items.description: A scroll that can only be used on Auf Haven Circlet. LUK+3. If failed, the item will be destroyed at a 50% rate.

items.name: [6th Anniversary] Scroll for Knuckle for ATT 40%
items.description: Improves Attack on Maple Anniversary Knuckles.
